meanings.definition: Overpowering or overwhelming in strength or influence.
meanings.sent1: The overmastering storm flooded the entire town.
meanings.sent2: Her overmastering presence commanded attention in the room.
meanings.sent3: The overmastering smell of freshly baked cookies made everyone hungry.
meanings.sent4: The overmastering urge to explore the unknown drove him to travel the world.
meanings.sent5: The overmastering fear of failure paralyzed her from taking risks.

meanings.sent1: The overmastering ruler ruled with an iron fist.
meanings.sent2: The overmastering desire for control consumed his every thought.
meanings.sent3: The overmastering need for order led her to color-code everything in her room.
meanings.sent4: The overmastering grip of addiction held him captive for years.
meanings.sent5: The overmastering power of love brought them together against all odds.
